1.content: Before we continue, are you a boy, or a girl?
1.title: Hold up

11.content:
You stared at the mirror in the bag. Why did your uncle, who got you the best stuff, got you a hand mirror. Seriously? You pulled it out of the bag, and looked at yourself.

What do you see?
11.title: Boy

choices: Everyone remembers him being a boy
111.content: So, he'll be transforming into a girl. What's the catch?
111.title: A girl his age

choices: You tap the mirror, needing to return....
A voice calls up from the kitchen....
Ripping your examination from your body, you look around the room.
1111.content:
Turning the mirror this way and that. You try to work out how this trick worked. She's wearing a sexy top... Well, most things would look sexy with her? wearing them. It's not revealing, but the way she fills that T-shirt. The same one you're wearing... even if you don't stretch it out in quite the same manner.

It was a mix of flattering and disturbing how attractive your female double looked. But your curiosity drove you to understand this joke? Was this some prototype tablet... with some bizarre instagram-type filter. He tried different expressions, sticking his tongue out, pouting, blowing kisses... But the reflection copied them exactly.

Tossing your mane of hair is weird, as the copy is blessed with shoulder length chestnut locks, that sway and sweep realistically. But your short cropped hair barely moves.

Raising your hand to touch the surface, you flinch, as those hands look different, the fingers slender... the nails painted.

With a snort at your own nervousness, you touch the surface of the glass. You recoil, as you feel a sting, like static electricity.

The illusion breaks, and you see yourself in the mirror. The same features, the rugged chin, the hint of stubble, and the look of confusion and disappointment that she's vanished. There's a hint of worry that you've broken some prototype device.

However....

- - - - -

It's at that point you realise something. As several observations crash over you in quick succession.

The hand holding the mirror is slim... the nails are painted the same gloss red.

Your breathing quickens... as you feel the brushing of hair against your shoulders, and you become aware of it at the edge of your vision.

Snapping your gaze downwards, you see that same T-shirt.... But now, you're truly filling as your former reflection did. The bust undeniable, still you grasp the neck of the shirt. Almost ripping it in your haste, you yank at it, until you hear the sound of stitches popping, seams bursting... But it confirms the cold dread in the pit of your stomach. That's no fake padding... You truly have a bust... and those nipples stiffen as you watch, becoming diamond hard as you shake your head in denial.
1111.title: Everyone else is gender swapped

11111.content: But nothing happens! You feel the press of warm skin on the mirror, blocking you from touching it! Someone opens the door to the room... who is it?
11111.title: You tap the mirror, needing to return....

choices: Beneath the magazines, you spot a pink laptop.
You find new, alien memories surfacing. You know John... is Joanna, somehow?!
You head over to the dresser, to rip open the top drawer.
A voice calls you to the breakfast table.
11113.content:
Wondering what kind of hallucination, or trick this is. You force yourself to put down the mirror. Your hands tremble with the effort, as you ease yourself off the bed. Not wanting to look away from the mirror, half expecting it to vanish if you look away.

You draw a shuddering breath, and make a deliberate effort to close your eyes, shut out the world. It's harder to deny the various sensations from your body as being delusional. The brush of the material over your body as you breathe. The innate sense of just being smaller, weaker is hard to fight.

Opening your eyes once more, you feel your eyelashes fluttering, as if they're bigger. They feel like butterflies have been attached, and you see the same distorted reality around you. Your body, still as feminine, your skins still as soft. Your body still as... still the same.

Nodding curtly to yourself, you have to admit this is truly your body. The half-reflection in the glass merely confirming this as the birthday present you never expected or wanted. Not feeling ready to leave the room, barely able to move you scan the room taking in all the differences.

Fixating on the closed wardrobe, you stealthily approach it. Unsure whether you're trying to catch sight of who ever is behind this. Hoping to catch sight of your clothes. Your boy clothes. Equally dreading seeing girl clothes.

You rip the door open with a heave, as if tearing off a plaster. The various items swing in the sudden gust. The diaphanous tops, blouses, skirts, and dresses swinging back and forth at your reveal. Your pulse pounds in your ears, as you turn your back on the vision of all those girly clothes. Allowing your weight to press the door closed, you only step away when you hear the magnetic catch click into place, hiding them from view.

The posters on the walls, now of boy bands, no hint of the fast sports cars, or the bikini clad beauties. The colour scheme is softer, more pastel, and less deep black, blue and red. The bedside table hidden beneath an avalanche of beauty and fashion magazines. But it's the make-up table that catches your attention. Its top covered with all kinds of sprays, lotions, balms, powders and God knows what. The three fold mirror making it hard not to catch your reflection.

Sitting down at the table, you wonder how to use all these things. Your eyes fall on the picture in the frame. A family portrait, slightly off, clearly you recognise yourself. Well, your female self in the mirror and in the picture.

You bury a gasp of realisation behind your hand, as you see John. Your brother.... Well, sister now, if you're to believe the picture. You also have to stare at your parents picture to see the differences, and similarities there. They've swapped too. Your mum's face still recognisable, the soft face, now looking masculine, with a harder jaw line, but still the same handsome features.
11113.title: You look around the room.

choices: You run down the stairs to join the family.
Your mobile chirps into life, a message... and a boy's name as the source.
Your phone rings, Inaya Day's 'Nasty Girl', as your ring tone.
As you jog downstairs, a new memory intrudes...
111133.content:
Your hand trembles as you yank open the drawer. The contents are mundane, but alien and terrifying too. The panties are expected, but the variety and the number make you wonder. Not ready to explore further, you close the drawer, and rest your hands on the top as the room seems to spin around you. Taking deep calming breaths, you hold them as long as possible. But your thoughts race, even as you steady your breathing.

Not sure, you like being such a girly girl. You pause, and try and take in this world, and your place in it. She was fine to admire from the other side of the glass, but to walk in ... those shoes, is a little scary. Scattered on the floor, you spot a shambles of sports shoes. With a sickening recall, you think back to the wardrobe. The non-girly item hanging there. The cheerleader outfit, the short skirt, already making you wish it were longer.

Belatedly, you check yourself out. Your bust still as obvious in your tight top, doesn't feel as distracting from the inside. As you concentrate, the discomfort rises, becoming clear. The straps at your shoulders, the relentless weight, and the feeling that you want to tug at it, or just rip it off is hard to resist.

Realising these are her? your? relaxing clothes, you take in the full ensemble. It's quite sporty, the leggings are skin tight, and flattering to your eyes. Running your hand over the soft fabric. You wonder if leggings is the right word, they feel sturdier. Yoga pants springs to mind, as a word, you don't quite recognise, but sounds vaguely right.

Your hands brush over the waist, exploring to be sure, it's not a one-piece thing. Is it a leotard, or a catsuit? And if there's a difference between them.

But the touch of soft flesh, as you taut tummy comes in contact with your bare hand. Patting your stomach, you admire it's firmness. Not muscular, but more than sporty. The elasticity of the top is confirmed, as you recoil at the discovery of a belly button piercing. The top, slamming your hand back down, to pat the embedded ring.

The patterning, the style all draw attention to your slender waist. Although the dart disappearing between your peachy arse cheeks feels like too much of an invitation.

"We're ready to go now." a voice calls up. A feminine voice, it doesn't sound quite right. But you hear the impatience that reminds you of your dad. Well, mum, here... for the moment.

"Coming." you answer. Your own voice sounding bubbly and freakishly girly to your ears. You dismiss the other clothes, each feeling more girly, than what you're already wearing. Checking your reflection, you already see your made-up face. The glint from your ears, peeking through what feels like a mane of hair. You confirm the presence of two tiny piercings in your ears.

"We're leaving. Now..." It snaps you out of your reverie, and you abandon the safety of your bedroom. Surely, your family will be just as safe, and probably more interesting too.

What happens now?

111212.content:
Your parents come into your room. Are they shocked to see a girl inside your room. Or do they now think it is normal you are a girl.
“Good morning Jenna” is what you could hear from your mother. Since she is addressing you with a female name, this indicates that your parents must be think that this is normal that you are a girl, damned, how also reality could have changed?
Luckily your parents don’t involve you into more chats or so and leave you alone after only some seconds: At least this has not changed, they still know that you are not a morning person, especially like today, Saturday!
But anyhow you are awake now and your new body felt... foreign! Also you must still be in the shock of the quickly change of gender. Looking down, you're view is now blocked by two large fleshy lumps, exposed to the world. You are painfully aware to the air on your new breasts.

You can't help but feel your new additions. Slowly bringing your hand up, you examine that too. It seems smaller and smoother. Better kept fingernails lie on the top, cleaner than your old male form.

Unable to hold any longer, your hand touches your new additions, and a wave of new sensation comes over you. Sensitivity and a hint of pleasure. They're soft and smooth. Each movement of them can be felt.

Next you feel your face. It too is smoother and slightly smaller, more round. Your lips feel slightly puffier and softer. You can't make much more out by just feeling but you can certainly feel hair, and not the facial kind. It grazes your shoulders and tickles your ears. Before, it was a simple short back and sides cut. Now it easily reached your mid back. Pulling it in front of your eyes, you can see it kept its old light-brown shade, if a little shinier.

Moving your hands further down, you feel your thinner waist and wider hips. You can't help but feel your ass through your boxers, it's larger and softer than previously. Your legs are smooth and hairless, but that brings you onto your biggest loss (heh). You put your hands down your pants and feel emptiness. You cringe at the feeling, or lack of it, or... new feeling. It's weird. Very weird. You don't experiment yet, too early, to soon.
It's strange that only now do you notice your room. Your desk still has its computer on top. The same wardrobe in the corner. Same posters, etc. But it's the little details.
There's a noticeable increase of the color pink in your room. Your bed sheets are now pinkish rather than the white that it was before. Your rucksack is now lied by pink rather than its old blue.

"This is- ", you begin to say, before realizing your new voice.
It's similar to your old voice, just higher and more girlish.
You cringe at the thought before moving yourself toward your wardrobe.
111212.title: Think it is normal that you are a girl

1112121.content:
You expect and fear the worse as you slowly open the doors of your wardrobe:
And indeed, you are greeted with feminized clothes. Even so it still has most of your old clothes such as your hiking boots and jeans (now tighter), but you also have bras, panties and boy shorts in place of boxers, tights, blouses, skirts and dresses. It's a horrifying prospect, you've never even thought of wearing a dress, let alone owning one!

You dread what will happen. What will your life now be?

You stand motionless for some more minutes in the middle of your room and hear your mum and Dad downstairs but you don't hear your sister then you remember she's out at a friend's for the weekend.

You need a shower so just before you leave your room you have another now closer look at your clothes and take a pair of jeans, socks, a pair of boy shorts but decided not to take a bra, but you didn't know that the vest top you picked already had a built-in bra.

You took everything into the bathroom and got a shower and then got dressed and made your way downstairs.
When you see your mum and Dad, you don’t know how to behave. You already found out for them it is not new that you are a girl, but for you, this is all new! And weird…

Your mom asked: “darling, any plans for today?”
Since you still could not believe and scope with the fact that reality might have changed you said:
“Mom, do I look different to you?”
“no you look pretty like always, you want to share breakfast with me and Dad?” your mom went on and you say yes, wondering more and more why you suddenly are a girl….
Wearing the selected wardrobe and feeling your new much longer hair you get confirmation of the fact that you now are a girl….
Now you see the nice breakfast Mom and Dad have prepared: You sit on your usual place at the table, feeling different since your ass now gives a different feeling while sitting and this strange emptiness between your legs is something you certainly need to get used to…..
While talking with your parents you realize how strange it is that your Dad also thinks you are his daughter and always have been. Besides the weird changes in your body you also have to scope with the loss of memory of being a girl. All your memories are the ones of being a boy and this boy mindset protests against being a female….This is just not you!
At least because of the greetings from your mom earlier you found out your female name you have now as a girl and you are lucky that you don’t need to ask your parents about your name, this would seem even more crazy….
So after the breakfast you went back to your room and see for your ID card, where the girly face you have now greets you from the picture. And the gender is marked as “f”.
Now you see the name: It is Jenna, a nice name for a girl, but not for you… Ups you are more an Jenna like an James now that is fact…..
What do you usually on Saturdays?

11132.content:
The morning comes far earlier than you wanted.

Still restless from the strange, fitful sleep you had restlessly endured the night before, you reluctantly rise from bed when your alarm clock begins angrily buzzing.

“It can't be morning already!” you grumble, stumbling from bed and cross the room to deactivate the clock.

The alarm clock doesn't lie though.

“Guess I'd better get dressed,” you mutter, stifling the urge to yawn. “I'll just have to make sure to hit the hay extra early tonight.”

Taking a step towards your dresser, it suddenly hits you.

These aren't your pajamas!

Suddenly, you're blinking your eyes to full alertness and examining yourself in a panic.

You're no longer wearing the pajamas you went to bed in last night. You're now clad in a girly looking, cotton nightgown that falls to just below your knees. The garment has a bit of white lace trim about the sleeves and collar. It's cream colored, with a floral pattern of red and green bouquets of flowers printed all over it.

“What the heck!” you say, dazed and confused by the suddenly bizarre turn of events. “Why am I wearing some girl's pajamas?”

Your mind races, trying to determine which of your friends would have the inclination (not to mention technical skill) necessary to pull off such a bizarre prank. Because you're quite certain that's what this is – just a prank. Somebody slipped into your room last night while you were sleeping, stripped you out of your pajamas, and dressed you in this flower-patterned nightmare without waking you up.

“Very funny, whoever you are!” you mutter sarcastically. “Once I figure out who did this, I'll get even with you.”

Now seriously annoyed, you strip off the nightgown and go to toss it into your dirty clothes hamper.

And it's time for surprise number two:

You're also wearing panties.

A pair of pink cotton panties patterned with little white hearts is now worn tightly around your hips. There's a bit of lacy, pink trim around the waistband and a tiny, decorative white bow embroidered at the top front of the undergarment.

“When I find out whose responsible for this, they'll be sorry!” you growl, starting to get seriously angry.

Stripping off the panties, you furiously toss them into your dirty clothes hamper as well, then turn to get some replacement clothes out of your dresser.

Surprise number three happens, and all your indignant rage instantly evaporates now replaced with genuine panic and fear.

Your clothes are all gone.

Every single item of clothing you once owned as been mysteriously replaced by the feminine equivalent.

Where once these dresser drawers housed your socks and underwear, they are now carefully lined with a rainbow of neatly folded pairs of girls panties and meticulously balled-up multicolored socks.

The next drawer is full of sparkling, glittery babydoll tees and pastel colored tank tops.

The next drawer has blouses.

The one after that has leggings.

You rush over to check your closet: inside is a tidy row of skirts and dresses, carefully pressed and hanging there waiting to be worn.

“What's happened to me?” you whisper with fear.
11132.title: You have a nightgown on

choices: Your mom and dad are shocked by your strange new attire.

111322.content:
Recognizing you have no other choice in the matter, you reluctantly select some of your new clothes and start to get dressed. Hopefully your parents have some idea what the heck is going on! You don't really want to wear these strange, girly garments … but the only other alternative is to stand naked in front of your folks – an option you find only slightly more humiliating than the decision to cross-dress.

After standing there nude and frozen with indecision for what seems an eternity, you finally trudge back reluctantly to your dresser, now freshly stocked with everything a fashionable young girl could want.

You select a pair of blue cotton panties with a minimal amount of girly, lacy trim. You match them with a pair of light blue ankle socks. Thankfully having no need for a bra, you move on to the plainest, most boring shirt you can find. It's got the words “Girl Power” written in glittery pink letters across the chest, but otherwise is just an ordinary, white t-shirt. The jeans you slide on look normal, but wind up being skinny jeans that tightly hug the lower half of your body. You fail to discover this until you're fully dressed, and seeing as you'd rather not dig through your new feminine wardrobe all over again, you decide to just stay this way. And there's no way you're digging through the rows of skirts and dresses in the closet! The tight, girly skinny jeans will simply have to suffice for the time being. You complete the outfit with a set of white and gray shoes with bright pink laces.

Feeling like a complete idiot, you take a deep breath to steady your nerves and then step out your bedroom door and go looking for your parents. They'll know what to do. At the very least, they can go buy you some new clothes. Or more likely help you track down wherever your original clothes went to. And who knows – maybe this really is just an incredibly elaborate prank? If so, your parents are bound to be “in” on the joke … and it'll all be over soon.

Right?

         Your body felt strange muscular, and having a long face with large nostrils just felt... weird. You quickly realized something, you now had a fancy pair of wings. You decide to give them a test-run in order to calm down. Like a plan taking off, you break into a gallop using your now muscular four legs. You begin to flap your wings and soar high into the sky. Like a bird, you look down at everything below you. The majestic valley, the chirping birds it was all music to your very soul. After a couple hours of air-born bliss, you land on the ground. You felt strangely relaxed, yet still unnerved. You needed to find a way to return to normal, sooner rather than later. You go back to the pond, and see only your equine face looking back at you. "-Chastity belt?!" You see the atrocious thing on you, as it turn out it is a part of your underwear, you put the segment back where it was, reattaching it, and looked to the holographic screen for answers. You find an unopened video.

Not seeing a remote, you remember that it is a touchscreen, you tap play and the advertisement begins.

"Greetings citizens of the the United Human Echelons!" The deep baritone voice of a man rang out.

"During our century long struggle with the Alvyryn invaders, we were beaten, brutalized, and the entirety of the human race was subjugated." You take this all in then breath in and out.

"Eventually, the Alvyryn suffered a plague, making them vulnerable, and then, lead by the Ancient Americans, we struck back at the invaders.

"Okay, that does not explain why we are so advanced if this is still 2017," You said.

"Attempts at reverse engineering the Alvyryn's technology was slow and gradual, but then came the great Albert Einstein," wait, WHAT?

"It was thanks to his efforts we successfully reverse engineered their technology, leading us to successfully drive them off of our world, but as you know, they have dug in on Venus, Mercury, Mars, and the Moon, where they launched missiles with the intent of devastating our population, in response the idea that all civilians over the age of seven would be required to wear armor for safety became law."

"Oh," you said, touching the rather thick breastplate you wore with hands covered in metal and some sort of polymer. "That explains the armor."

"For the past seventy years we have been developing our technology, making advancements with our military and civil sciences, and now, under the supervision of 2nd Grand General "Mad Dog" Mattis and the people at Nasca, we are finally on the precipise of driving the Alvyryn from the moon!"

"And for the purpose of this, we are initiating a great draft, all able bodied citizens between the ages of 14-35 qualify to join the invasion force.
